== Ubuntu Teens ==

{| class="wikitable"

| ##ubuntu-teens

We have been moved to https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ubunteens/ Welcomes teens from ages 11-21! This channel is devoted to teens that use Ubuntu! This channel also welcomes people that are still kids at heart! This channel follows the Code of Conduct! Our policy is not to ban teens, but, if users are getting offensive... They will be banned! The goal of this channel is to discuss new|cool|awesome|amazing features. We will also discuss, what can make Ubuntu better!
